remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了绘制到显示设备的方法。The class provides methods for drawing to the display device. 类，如和封装 GDI + 基元。Classes such as and encapsulate GDI+ primitives. 类用于绘制直线和曲线，从抽象类派生的类时用于填充的形状的内部。The class is used to draw lines and curves, while classes derived from the abstract class are used to fill the interiors of shapes. > [!CAUTION] > 类中用于 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中不支持命名空间。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 有关受支持的替代方法，请参阅[Windows 映像组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx)。For a supported alternative, see [Windows Imaging Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
